mapper.select: select id, subId, phaseABLineV, phaseBCLineV, phaseCALineV, phaseAV, phaseBV, phaseCV, phaseAI, phaseBI, phaseCI, activeP, reactiveP, powerFactor, switchStatus, totalChargeElectricity, totalDischargeElectricity, totalChargePrice, totalDischargePrice from grid_connection_point

select id, subId, phaseABLineV, phaseBCLineV, phaseCALineV, phaseAV, phaseBV, phaseCV, phaseAI, phaseBI, phaseCI, activeP, reactiveP, powerFactor, switchStatus, totalChargeElectricity, totalDischargeElectricity, totalChargePrice, totalDischargePrice from grid_connection_point where subId = #{subId}
mapper.insert: insert into grid_connection_point ( subId, phaseABLineV, phaseBCLineV, phaseCALineV, phaseAV, phaseBV, phaseCV, phaseAI, phaseBI, phaseCI, activeP, reactiveP, powerFactor, switchStatus, totalChargeElectricity, totalDischargeElectricity, totalChargePrice, totalDischargePrice ) values ( #{subId}, #{phaseABLineV}, #{phaseBCLineV}, #{phaseCALineV}, #{phaseAV}, #{phaseBV}, #{phaseCV}, #{phaseAI}, #{phaseBI}, #{phaseCI}, #{activeP}, #{reactiveP}, #{powerFactor}, #{switchStatus}, #{totalChargeElectricity}, #{totalDischargeElectricity}, #{totalChargePrice}, #{totalDischargePrice} )
